snippet: What makes an author worthy of serious study? In this lesson, students discuss assumptions about gender and literature through close reading of various texts, and through a deeper inquiry into the work of Jane Austen.
abstract: What makes an author worthy of serious study? In this lesson, students discuss assumptions about gender and literature through close reading of various texts, and through a deeper inquiry into the work of Jane Austen.

byline.original: By AMANDA CHRISTY BROWN and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

headline.main: No Pride in Prejudice: Looking Beyond the Gender Labels to Experience Literature
